description:
The controls are easy!
Spin the world using the L Button and R Button on your Joy-Con™ to roll the ball and push the switch!

How to play:
Use either the L Button or the left side of the touchscreen to rotate to the left.
Use either the R Button or the right side of the touch screen to rotate to the right.

◆ Stages
Over 200 stages! From simple ones to absolute brain busters, there are tons of challenges to take on!

◆ Balls
Earn points by clearing stages.
Use those points to unlock a variety of balls to use.

◆ Create
In this mode, you can build your own stage.
Make something fun for your family and friends to try!

◆ Battle
Hand out the Joy-Con™ controllers and battle with up to four players!
The person who can clear the various stages fastest wins.
Finish as fast as you can in this five-set match!
name: World Spin
